text: قُلْ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْحُجَّةُ ٱلْبَـٰلِغَةُ ۖ فَلَوْ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Say, "With Allah is the far-reaching argument. If He had willed, He would have guided you all."
translation.id.indonesian: Katakanlah: "Allah mempunyai hujjah yang jelas lagi kuat; maka jika Dia menghendaki, pasti Dia memberi petunjuk kepada kamu semuanya".
